name: Beer and Loving in Transylvania
description:
After obsessing over vampires you finally get your dream date.
In this point and click game you travel to Transylvania to meet up with your Tinder match – Vlad. But he'd rather drink beer than your juicy veins.

Created as a school project at The Game Assembly during 8 weeks half-time.

──────────────────────────────────────────────


Stinky Scarab Games consists of the following wonderful team:

Programmers
Andreas Winther Sorman | Daniel Vindhjärta | Erik Wapner
Goran Taha | Sam Stålhandske

Graphical Artists
Alfons Sahlberg | Ivar Roxner Kinny | Leon Miksec
Robert Pettersson | Simon Martinsson

Level Designers
Emma Thorsander | Karl Thörnblom
